title: New Rune IS SO BROKEN I REFUSE to play the game until it is fixed.
body: This new Rune is so broken I REFUSE to play the game until it is fixed. Tryndamere just level 1 dove my under the tower at full HP and 3 shot me as Yorick.......

replies.body:
There is no way a lv1 anything got off three hits under tower.

Go away, foul troll.

The only way would actually see this happening is if:
You let Trynd get max rage
You traded horribly
Trynd chases you down when you're horribly low and trying to cs
Trynd does Ignite + Flash AA on you and walks out fine because he only took 1 tower shot

lol conqueror isn't even that good lvl 1, grasp is better XD

www.twitch.tv/nightmarr
